Riverdale on the Hudson, New York City â€” Tuesday morning
The bearer is my daughter's maid, & I beg as a favor that you will allow her to have access to my daughter's room, so that she can unpack the trunk.
Yours very truly Mark Twain (SL. Clemens ) My daughter is Miss Clara Clemens.
Mark Twain, Riverdale, NY, to Unknown (1901-1903)
